Why do you guys call rito a pussy, and that his harem is undeserved? For the most part I agree that some girls he got randomly. But for most he did a brave action that made him seem likable to that female, or a overall good deed. Also why does he deserve to be cucked for being clueless and dense? Yes I agree that he is both of these, but most of these girls he has little interest in. Isn’t also a little bit unreasonable to think that these side characters who are usually unliked amongst the female cast are gonna somehow pull them when these side characters did jack shit?

I mean, Rito's denseness and luck transcends logic. He doesn't deserve them, but the world would have to implode and be recreated again for this to happen. If Kamijou Touma didn't exist ; he would've been the Harem God!

This shit is some unrealistic headassery I've ever seen, even if it's fiction! How could the Harem King get cucked and lose his harem!? Impossible! Even if they actively tried to cheat, or get brainwashed, it wouldn't work!!
